content: to celebrate halloween 2020 i ll be releasing one pattern per day in the week leading up to october 31st the final pattern in the series and my personal favourite a spider the pattern and tutorial is available here https //bit ly/h07sp **pattern details ** **hook size ** 3mm **yarn ** 8ply/dk **terms ** us **difficulty ** advanced beginner **finished size ** 18cm x 16cm **materials & supplies** to make this pattern you will need yarn whichever colour or colours you like best scissors needle stitch markers pins stuffing
